sense.def:
Squarely
pomeni neposredno in v sredino namesto posredno ali pod kotom.

seg.quote: The television mast fell squarely onto a Methodist chapel.

sense.def:
To face something squarely
pomeni z nečim se soočiti neposredno, ne da bi se poskusili tistega izogniti.

seg.quote: This difficulty will have to be squarely faced.
